name: job-portal
description: This is my final year project names as JOB PORTAL where recruiter and jobseekers can come and get information about jobs like recruiter can post a job and jobseeker can apply for a job additionally we have added a free resume builder in our app where you just need to enter few details about your portfolio and a resume will be made for you

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
